column5: So I spent the long weekend in Florida shark fishing with a buddy I fish for musky with here on St Clair. We got a lot of sharks. A bull, a tiger, a lemon, and a hammerhead. I split the videos into 3 episodes based on the nights they were caught. Here is the first night, where I caught a bull shark on spinning gear!
Thats epic!  Thanks for the video  Boy id love to try that one day!
Love it.    Wish we had bigger fish in the Great Lakes...
Thanks guys. Ya I wish so bad we had fish that could rip drag like that in Ontario..
good stuff. Enjoyed that...and nice release
Thanks. Shark fishing is 50% catching and 50% about getting a clean release. Love seeing them swim off strong!
Yeah id be a lil nervous on getting hook out, but the release Id probably need to return my gitch to cabelas???
